comment: A variant of the Axiom of Union ~ ax-un . For any set ` x ` , there exists a set ` y ` whose members are exactly the members of the members of ` x ` i.e. the union of ` x ` . Axiom Union of [BellMachover] p. 466. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jun-2006.)
